homepageData.title: Sign up
homepageData.text: Create a free account on our website by providing your contact information to start your journey to better mental health today.

homepageData.title: Take our Assessment test
homepageData.text: Answer our free assessment questions to know your mental health state from a counsellor/ therapist's point of view, allowing us to achieve a customised service with you.

homepageData.title: Search for a therapist
homepageData.text: Browse through our network of licensed therapists, based on your location, language, and specialty. You can view the therapist's profile, ratings, and availability.

homepageDataTwo.title: Book a session
homepageDataTwo.text: Select a convenient time slot and book your first session with the therapist of your choice. Our platform is designed to make therapy accessible and convenient for everyone, anywhere, at any time. Whether you have a busy schedule, a preference for remote care, or a need for a specific therapist, we have got you covered.

homepageDataTwo.title: Start therapy
homepageDataTwo.text: On the day and time of your session, log into your account and join the video call with your therapist. You can use a computer, tablet, or smartphone with a webcam and a stable internet connection. If you have scheduled a face to face meeting, you get to the venue on time; be there at least 10-15 mins before your session begins. All our therapy sessions are encrypted and secure, ensuring the privacy and confidentiality of your communication with your therapist.

homepageDataTwo.title: Continue therapy
homepageDataTwo.text: After your first session, you can book and attend as many sessions as you need, with the same or a different therapist. You can also access your session history and billing information from your account.Start your journey to better mental health today.
